title: dEvi gowri
sahitya:
dEvI gaurI ninna dhyAnisuva janarigE jananAdhi bhayaviruvadE





anupallavi



 bhAva raagam laya rakti bhaktigaLinda ninna pAvanatara pAda pankaja vasEvisi



caraNam

 sharIra vINege AdiSTaja madhyatArada surutiyatri nADiya sUkSma shabda dAtuva

 vara guNangaLunura saiyoLsErisi sura varanudE harikEsha niratE ninagarpisi
